column6:
This is it -- the battle you've been waiting for! The Hulk VS The Gamma Corps! With an outcome so shocking, so earth shattering -- it absolutely must be seen to be believed! Plus: There's no one in the entirety of World War Hulk that has it in for ol' Greenskin like General Ryker. Find out why as we take a trip through the shared history these two characters possess-- including a surprising connection Ryker has to a key event in Hulk history! Don't miss the issue that everyone will be talking about!,2007,9
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Carlos Ferreira | inker:Sandu Florea | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Wil Quintana | writer:Frank Tieri
